title: INVENTORY / BOOTS WITH ROTTING FLESH
description: You can look at these boots closely if you dare.

dialogueTree.title: Boots with Rotting Flesh: "These boots were probably left on t..."
dialogueTree.text: These boots were probably left on the corpse because they were impossible to pull off while it was hanging. They're not exactly pleasant to look at right now, much less smell.

links.title: Boots with Rotting Flesh: "Even less pleasant now that you kno..."
links.text: Even less pleasant now that you know the name of the man pieces of whose flesh are still stuck to the insides of the boots.

links.title: You: "Will I ever be able to wear them?"
links.text: Will I ever be able to wear them?

links.title: Boots with Rotting Flesh: "The size seems about right. Once yo..."
links.text: The size seems about right. Once you get the foul-smelling flesh-gunk out.

links.title: You: "Isn't there a saying about walking..."
links.text: Isn't there a saying about walking in another man's shoes?

links.title: Boots with Rotting Flesh: "You've seen too much to be that nai..."
links.text: You've seen too much to be that naive, even if you don't remember it. You'll never know what it was like to be him.

links.title: Boots with Rotting Flesh: "Hopefully you will know who they be..."
links.text: Hopefully you will know who they belonged to very soon.

links.title: Boots with Rotting Flesh: "You missed your chance to learn mor..."
links.text: You missed your chance to learn more about them by telling Alice the wrong serial number.

links.title: Boots with Rotting Flesh: "Hopefully soon you'll know more abo..."
links.text: Hopefully soon you'll know more about them.

links.title: Boots with Rotting Flesh: "You'll know more about them once yo..."
links.text: You'll know more about them once you run the serial number you found.

links.title: Boots with Rotting Flesh: "Graceful whorls cover the boots' gl..."
links.text: Graceful whorls cover the boots' glossy surface. These will be gorgeous once you get them clean.

links.title: Boots with Rotting Flesh: "All those graceful whorls again, an..."
links.text: All those graceful whorls again, and the serial number hidden among them.

links.title: You: "Look at the soles of the boots."
links.text: Look at the soles of the boots.

links.title: Boots with Rotting Flesh: ""Fairweather T-500 / VE" is imprint..."
links.text: "Fairweather T-500 / VE" is imprinted under each heel.

links.title: Boots with Rotting Flesh: "Still just pieces of sock and rotti..."
links.text: Still just pieces of sock and rotting cadaver.
